title: Amazon Echo Dot (5th Gen) - Factory Reset
text:
# Amazon Echo Dot (5th Gen) - Factory Reset
## Full Document

To Reset (Keep Connections): Press and hold 'Action' button (Dot icon) for 25 seconds. 

Factory Reset (Erase All): Press and hold 'Microphone Off' and 'Volume Down' buttons together for 20 seconds. Wait for the light ring to turn orange.
summary: Resetting the device while keeping smart home connections.

title: Anker 737 Power Bank - Trickle Charge
text:
# Anker 737 Power Bank - Trickle Charge
## Full Document

Trickle Charge Mode (Green LED): 
1. Double press the button. The small LED turns green. 
2. Use this for low-power devices like AirPods or smartwatches to prevent the bank from auto-shutting off. 
3. Press once to exit mode. 

Screen Reset: If screen % is inaccurate, fully deplete the bank to 0% and recharge to 100%.
summary: Using the digital screen and trickle charging for earbuds.

title: AirPods Pro (2nd Gen) - Connection & Audio Issues
text:
# AirPods Pro (2nd Gen) - Connection & Audio Issues
## Full Document

If AirPods won't connect: 
1. Put them in the case, close lid, wait 30 seconds. 
2. Open lid. Go to Settings > Bluetooth, tap 'i', select 'Forget This Device'. 
3. With lid open, hold the setup button on the back of the case for 15 seconds until the light flashes amber, then white. 


If ANC is weak: Ensure the ear tip fit test in iOS settings shows a 'Good Seal'.
summary: Steps to resolve connectivity drops and active noise cancellation failures.

title: Apple Watch Ultra - Depth App & Action Button
text:
# Apple Watch Ultra - Depth App & Action Button
## Full Document

Action Button Setup: Go to Settings > Action Button. Can be set to: Workout, Stopwatch, Waypoint, Backtrack, Dive, Flashlight. 

Depth App Auto-Launch: To prevent the depth app from opening when washing hands, go to Settings > General > Auto-Launch > turn off 'Auto-Launch App'.
summary: Configuring the Action Button for diving and workouts.

title: Bose QuietComfort 45 - Multipoint Bluetooth
text:
# Bose QuietComfort 45 - Multipoint Bluetooth
## Full Document

Clear Device List: Slide Power switch to the right and hold for 15 seconds until 'Bluetooth Device List Cleared' is heard. 

Multipoint: Connect to Device A. Slide switch to right and release to put in pairing mode again. Connect Device B. Audio will switch automatically based on playback.
summary: Connecting to two devices simultaneously.

title: Breville Barista Express - Pressure Gauge
text:
# Breville Barista Express - Pressure Gauge
## Full Document

Pressure Low (Under-Extracted): 
1. Grind is too coarse. Move dial to a LOWER number (Finer). 
2. Increase dose amount. 
3. Tamp harder (approx 30lbs). 

Pressure High (Over-Extracted): 
1. Grind too fine. Move dial to HIGHER number. 
2. Decrease dose.
summary: Dialing in espresso extraction pressure.

title: Canon G3000 Series - Ink System & Reset
text:
# Canon G3000 Series - Ink System & Reset
## Full Document

Error 5B00 (Ink Absorber Full): 
1. Turn off. Hold Power + Stop buttons. 
2. Release Stop, keep holding Power. 
3. Press Stop 5 times. Release Power. 

Air in tubes: Perform 'System Cleaning' (takes 10 mins). Ensure tank valves are vertical (Open).
summary: Resetting the ink absorber counter and fixing air in pipes.

title: DJI Mini 3 Pro - RC Pairing & Calibration
text:
# DJI Mini 3 Pro - RC Pairing & Calibration
## Full Document

Link Remote: 
1. Power on Drone (Press once, then hold). 
2. Power on Controller. 
3. Hold Drone power button for 4 seconds until it beeps. 
4. In Controller settings, tap 'Pair'. 

Compass Error: Move away from metal (cars, rebar). Rotate drone 360 horizontally, then 360 vertically.
summary: Linking the drone to the controller and compass calibration.

title: Dell XPS 15 - BIOS & Overheating
text:
# Dell XPS 15 - BIOS & Overheating
## Full Document

Fan noise/Heat: Open 'Dell Power Manager'. Set Thermal Management to 'Quiet' or 'Cool'. 

BIOS Update: Ensure battery is >10%. Download .exe from Dell Support. 
Force Shutdown: Hold power button for 25 seconds to drain flea power.
summary: Managing thermal profiles and updating BIOS.

title: Dyson V15 Detect - Filter & Blockage Guide
text:
# Dyson V15 Detect - Filter & Blockage Guide
## Full Document

Filter Cleaning Alert: 
1. Unscrew the purple filter unit at the top of the machine. 
2. Wash under cold tap water. Do NOT use detergent. 
3. Squeeze gently and let dry for at least 24 hours in a well-ventilated area. 

Motor Pulsing: This indicates a blockage. Check the wand inlet and the bin flap.
summary: Cleaning instructions for the HEPA filter and clearing airway blockages.

title: Fitbit Charge 5 - Sync & GPS Issues
text:
# Fitbit Charge 5 - Sync & GPS Issues
## Full Document

If the screen is unresponsive (Black Screen): 
1. Connect to the charging cable. 
2. Press the button on the flat end of the USB connector 3 times within 8 seconds. 
3. Wait for the Fitbit logo. 

GPS: Ensure 'GLONASS' is enabled in the Exercise app settings for better tracking in urban areas.
summary: Resolving synchronization failures and GPS signal loss.

title: Garmin Fenix 7 - GPS & Map Manager
text:
# Garmin Fenix 7 - GPS & Map Manager
## Full Document

GPS Soak: Before starting a race, wait 2-3 minutes AFTER the GPS bar turns green to ensure max accuracy. 

Map Manager: Connect to WiFi. Go to Settings > Map > Map Manager. Select region to download TopoActive maps. Note: Downloads are slow; plug into charger.
summary: Managing TopoActive maps and fixing GPS drift.

title: GoPro Hero 11 Black - SD Card & Battery Errors
text:
# GoPro Hero 11 Black - SD Card & Battery Errors
## Full Document

SD Card Error: Ensure you are using a V30 or UHS-3 rated card. To format: Swipe down > Preferences > Reset > Format SD Card. 

Cold Weather: Use the Enduro battery (white cap). Standard batteries may shut down in temps below 0°C even if charged.
summary: Handling SD card formatting and cold weather battery performance.

title: Google Nest Hub (2nd Gen) - Screen Settings
text:
# Google Nest Hub (2nd Gen) - Screen Settings
## Full Document

Screen too bright at night: 
1. Swipe up > Settings > Display > Auto-brightness. 
2. Check 'Low Light' settings to ensure 'Turn off screen' is selected for darkness. 

Reset: Hold volume up and volume down buttons together for 10 seconds.
summary: Managing display brightness and sleep sensing.

title: HP OfficeJet Pro 9015 - Printhead Error
text:
# HP OfficeJet Pro 9015 - Printhead Error
## Full Document

Printhead Problem: 
1. Open cartridge access door. 
2. Lift the white latch handle on the side of the carriage. 
3. Remove the printhead (the basket holding cartridges). 
4. Wipe electrical contacts with lint-free cloth. Reinsert and lock latch.
summary: Reseating the printhead to fix cartridge errors.

title: Instant Pot Duo - 'Burn' Message & Sealing
text:
# Instant Pot Duo - 'Burn' Message & Sealing
## Full Document

BURN Message: 
1. Press Cancel. Release steam (Vent). 
2. Open lid. Check inner pot for scorched food. 
3. Deglaze pot with water. 
4. Layer ingredients: Do not put thick sauces (BBQ/Tomato) at the bottom; place them on top of meat/veg.
summary: Fixing the overheat error and sealing issues.

title: Fujifilm Instax Mini 11 - Flashing Lights
text:
# Fujifilm Instax Mini 11 - Flashing Lights
## Full Document

Orange Light Flashing: 
1. Batteries are dead. Replace with two fresh AA ALKALINE batteries. 
2. Do NOT use rechargeable batteries (voltage 1.2V is too low; needs 1.5V). 

Photo stuck: Do not pull. Replace batteries and turn camera on to eject.
summary: Understanding LED error codes.

title: JBL Flip 6 - Charging & Water Protection
text:
# JBL Flip 6 - Charging & Water Protection
## Full Document

Red Light Blinking on Charge Port: 
1. Water or salt detected in the port. 
2. Do NOT charge. Shake speaker to remove water and let air dry for 2 hours. 

Hard Reset: Hold 'Volume +' and 'Play' buttons for 3 seconds while powered on.
summary: Understanding the USB-C protection mode.

title: Keychron K2 Keyboard - Bluetooth Switching
text:
# Keychron K2 Keyboard - Bluetooth Switching
## Full Document

Pairing: 
1. Switch side toggle to 'BT'. 
2. Hold Fn + 1 for 4 seconds until the key flashes rapidly. 
3. Search for 'Keychron K2' on device. 

Mac/Win Mode: Use the side toggle. In Windows mode, the 'Option' key becomes 'Alt' and 'Command' becomes 'Windows'.
summary: Switching between Mac/Windows and pairing devices.

title: Kindle Paperwhite (11th Gen) - Frozen Screen
text:
# Kindle Paperwhite (11th Gen) - Frozen Screen
## Full Document

If the screen is stuck on a book page or screensaver: 
1. Press and hold the power button on the bottom edge. 
2. Continue holding for a full 40 seconds. Ignore any 'Restart' dialog boxes on the screen. 
3. Release the button only when the screen flashes or the progress bar appears.
summary: Hard reset instructions for unresponsive or frozen e-ink screens.

title: LG C2 OLED TV - Pixel Cleaning
text:
# LG C2 OLED TV - Pixel Cleaning
## Full Document

Pixel Cleaning: 
1. Go to Settings > General > OLED Care > OLED Panel Care. 
2. Select 'Pixel Cleaning'. 
3. Choose 'Start Now' (TV turns off for 10 mins) or 'Start Once TV is Off'. 
Warning: Do not unplug the TV from the wall during this process.
summary: Preventing burn-in and using Pixel Cleaning.

title: Logitech MX Master 3S - Flow & Connectivity
text:
# Logitech MX Master 3S - Flow & Connectivity
## Full Document

To pair with a second computer: 
1. Turn the mouse over. 
2. Press the Easy-Switch button to select channel 2. 
3. Press and hold the Easy-Switch button for 3 seconds until the LED blinks fast. 

Troubleshooting Lag: If using the Logi Bolt receiver, ensure it is plugged into a USB 2.0 port or use a USB extension cable to prevent USB 3.0 interference.
summary: Setup guide for Easy-Switch and Logitech Flow across computers.

title: Nanoleaf Shapes - Hard Reset
text:
# Nanoleaf Shapes - Hard Reset
## Full Document

Hard Reset: 
1. Unplug the power from the wall. 
2. Hold the Power and Brightness (+) buttons on the controller. 
3. Plug power back in while holding buttons. 
4. Keep holding for 10 seconds until lights flash. 
5. Wait 2 minutes for controller to reboot before pairing.
summary: Resetting the controller when 'Unreachable'.

title: Nespresso Vertuo Next - Descaling & Errors
text:
# Nespresso Vertuo Next - Descaling & Errors
## Full Document

Orange Light Blinking Rapidly: Machine needs descaling. 
1. Empty capsule container. 
2. Fill tank with descaling agent and water. 
3. Lock machine. Hold button for 7 seconds to enter mode. 

Red Light (steady): Electronic error. Unplug for 15 minutes.
summary: Interpreting light codes and performing descaling.

title: Google Nest Thermostat - Power Issues (E298)
text:
# Google Nest Thermostat - Power Issues (E298)
## Full Document

Error E298 means no power from the HVAC system. 
1. Remove the display unit. 
2. Check if the Blue C-wire is fully inserted and the tab is depressed. 
3. If no C-wire exists, install the Nest Power Connector at the furnace control board. 

[Image of Nest Thermostat wiring backplate]
summary: Diagnosing C-Wire issues and low power warnings.

title: Nintendo Switch - Joy-Con Drift & Rail Issues
text:
# Nintendo Switch - Joy-Con Drift & Rail Issues
## Full Document

Drift Fix: 
1. System Settings > Controllers > Calibrate Control Sticks. 
2. Press 'X' to calibrate. 
3. Use a cotton swab with 99% isopropyl alcohol to clean under the rubber flap of the stick. 

Loose Connection: If Joy-Con disconnects in handheld mode, clean the metal contacts on the side rail with a dry toothbrush.
summary: Calibrating control sticks and fixing connection rails.

title: Oura Ring Gen 3 - Charger Troubleshooting
text:
# Oura Ring Gen 3 - Charger Troubleshooting
## Full Document

Charger LED: 
1. Pulsing White: Charging. 
2. Solid Green: Fully charged. 
3. Blinking Red: Error. Take ring off, tap charger on table firmly to reset internal connectors, place ring back on. 

Soft Reset: Place ring on charger. Tap the ring on the table (while on charger) 3 times.
summary: Interpreting charger light colors.

title: PlayStation 5 - Safe Mode & Database Rebuild
text:
# PlayStation 5 - Safe Mode & Database Rebuild
## Full Document

To access Safe Mode: 
1. Turn off console completely. 
2. Press and hold the Power button for 7 seconds (release after the second beep). 
3. Connect controller via USB. 
4. Select Option 5 'Clear Cache and Rebuild Database' to fix game crashes or UI lag.
summary: Using Safe Mode to fix system crashes and storage glitches.

title: Philips Hue Bridge - Internet & Light Sync
text:
# Philips Hue Bridge - Internet & Light Sync
## Full Document

LED Status: 
1. First LED (Power): Must be solid. 
2. Second LED (Network): Solid means connected to router. If blinking, check Ethernet cable. 
3. Third LED (Internet): Solid means cloud connection. If blinking, router has no internet access. 

Factory Reset: Use a pin to press the button on the bottom for 10 seconds (Erases all scenes).
summary: Diagnosing the 3 LED status lights on the bridge.

title: reMarkable 2 - Marker Issues
text:
# reMarkable 2 - Marker Issues
## Full Document

Jagged Lines: 
1. The EMR screen is sensitive to magnets. Remove any third-party cases with magnets. 
2. Touch the bezel with the pen to discharge static. 

Ghosting: Go to Settings > Storage > Check Sync. Force a screen refresh by putting the device to sleep and waking it up.
summary: Fixing jagged lines and ghosting.

title: Ring Video Doorbell (2nd Gen) - WiFi Change
text:
# Ring Video Doorbell (2nd Gen) - WiFi Change
## Full Document

Device Offline: 
1. Remove the security screw (star bit) and faceplate. 
2. Press the orange button on the side to enter setup mode (Spinning white light). 
3. Open Ring App > Three lines (top left) > Devices > [Doorbell] > Device Health > Reconnect to WiFi.
summary: Reconnecting to a new router or password.

title: Roborock S7 - Mop & Sensor Cleaning
text:
# Roborock S7 - Mop & Sensor Cleaning
## Full Document

Error 1 (Lidar blocked): Check the orange turret on top. Use a q-tip to spin the laser module gently. 

Mop Smell: Slide the mop cloth off. Wash in washing machine. Clean the water tank with a mild vinegar solution if calcified.
summary: Cleaning the vibarise mop module and cliff sensors.

title: Roku Streaming Stick 4K - Remote Pairing
text:
# Roku Streaming Stick 4K - Remote Pairing
## Full Document

Remote stopped working: 
1. Unplug Roku stick from TV. 
2. Open remote battery cover. Press and hold the small button for 5 seconds until the light flashes green/white. 
3. Plug Roku stick back in. 
4. Keep remote close to stick during boot-up.
summary: Re-pairing the voice remote and troubleshooting power.

title: Samsung T7 Touch SSD - Fingerprint Setup
text:
# Samsung T7 Touch SSD - Fingerprint Setup
## Full Document

If the drive is not recognized or locked: 
1. Connect to PC using the USB-C cable. 
2. Open the Samsung Portable SSD software. 
3. If LED circle is blinking blue, it is waiting for fingerprint. Touch the sensor box. 
4. To reset password, you must use the recovery key provided during initial setup.
summary: Setting up security and fingerprint recognition on portable SSD.

title: Sonos Arc - HDMI eARC & Trueplay
text:
# Sonos Arc - HDMI eARC & Trueplay
## Full Document

No Sound: Ensure HDMI cable is plugged into the TV port labeled 'ARC' or 'eARC'. Enable CEC (Viera Link/AnyNet+) in TV settings. 

Trueplay: 
1. Go to System > [Room Name] > Trueplay. 
2. Remove phone case. 
3. Walk around the room waving the phone slowly as prompted.
summary: Setting up TV audio and room calibration.

title: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones - Reset & Pairing Guide
text:
# Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones - Reset & Pairing Guide
## Full Document

To initialize the headset to factory settings: 
1. Turn off the headset. 
2. Press and hold the (Power) button and the (NC/AMB) button simultaneously for about 7 seconds. 
3. The indicator (blue) will flash 4 times. 
4. This operation resets volume settings and deletes pairing information. 



To enter Pairing Mode: Press and hold Power for 5 seconds until you hear 'Bluetooth Pairing'.
summary: Instructions for factory resetting and pairing the WH-1000XM5 noise-canceling headphones.

title: TP-Link Kasa Smart Plug - Reset
text:
# TP-Link Kasa Smart Plug - Reset
## Full Document

Soft Reset (Keep Config): Hold button for 5 seconds (Blinks Amber/Green). 

Factory Reset: Hold button for 10 seconds (Blinks Amber rapidly). Use this if changing routers.
summary: Soft and Hard reset procedures.

title: WD My Passport - Formatting for Mac/PC
text:
# WD My Passport - Formatting for Mac/PC
## Full Document

Drive Read-Only on Mac: Drive is likely NTFS. 
1. Open Disk Utility (Mac). 
2. Select Drive > Erase. 
3. Choose 'ExFAT' for compatibility with both Windows and Mac, or 'APFS' for Mac only. 
Warning: Erasing deletes all data.
summary: Formatting the drive for compatibility.

title: Waterpik Aquarius - Low Pressure
text:
# Waterpik Aquarius - Low Pressure
## Full Document

No Water Flow: 
1. Check the black rubber valve in the reservoir tank bottom. Push it with a finger to ensure it isn't stuck. 
2. Fill with warm water and vinegar (1:1). Run half a tank to descale internal pump. 
3. Ensure the 'Pause' button on the handle is not engaged.
summary: Fixing water flow issues.

title: Xbox Series X - Display & Video Reset
text:
# Xbox Series X - Display & Video Reset
## Full Document

Black Screen on Startup: 
1. Eject any disc. 
2. Press and hold the Xbox button on the console for 10 seconds to turn off. 
3. Press and hold the Xbox button and the Pair button simultaneously. 
4. Keep holding Pair until the second beep. Console boots in 640x480 mode.
summary: Resetting video output when screen is black.
